title: Fraser Hill Farm 3-Ft. Music and Motion Santa with Prelit Christmas Tree | Indoor Animated Holiday Home Decor | Christmas Animatronic | FASC036M-19WHTGLD
features: CHRISTMAS ANIMATRONIC: Music and Motion Santa Claus moves his head and arms with or without music. Easy to operate - just plug it in to see movement! Music on/off button is located under Santa's left sleeve.
MUSICAL: Jingle Bells can be heard through the speaker located inside his left hand (song lasts approximately lasts approx. 51 seconds). Music volume is approximately 72 dBs and cannot be adjusted.
PRE-LIT LED LIGHTS: Prelit Christmas tree, with 50 warm white LED bulbs, lights up via a battery-operated on/off switch (requires 3 AA batteries - NOT included).
FESTIVE OUTFIT: Elegantly dressed in a golden velvet coat with furry white trim over a golden satin suit. White fleece mittens and boots completes Santa's elegant style.
FULLY ASSEMBLED FOR INDOOR USE: No assembly required - remove from packaging, fluff, and display! For many years of enjoyment, indoor use is strongly recommended.
description: Here comes Santa Claus with a beautiful Christmas tree! Our Music and Motion Santa, by Fraser Hill Farm, will fill your home, office, or shop with holiday cheer. Dressed in golden holiday splendor, Santa's round chubby cheeks and friendly smile will add an elegant touch to your holiday decor. When you plug him in, Santa will move his head and arms with or without music, bringing joy to one and all. Santa's decorated pine tree lights up with fifty warm white LED bulbs. Standing 3 feet tall, Santa will look majestic near the family Christmas tree, in your favorite display window, or greeting your guests in the foyer. Pair him with our Music and Motion Mrs. Claus in her matching outfit for an extra special display (sold separately model # FMC036-1WT9).
